description: Schluter shower pans are incredibly easy to customize. For example, I had to cut this one to fit the shower width and notch it around an old chimney. But here's a big tip, connect your circular saw to a HEPA vac. This keeps your workspace clean and safe. If you're remodeling a bathroom and need help, join our Gold or Platinum membership at https://homerepairtutor.com/platinum-membership/
title: How to Cut Schluter Shower Pan - #shorts
